text:
Instructions: In this tab, you will find multiple text tiles that contain tasks for you to complete during this lesson. You can bring all the tiles over to your workspace now, or come and get them at the appropriate time. Either way, wait until you reach the time in the lesson to answer the question. Do not go on ahead!

1. Drag each tile by its 6 dots into your workspace.

2. If there is not a special tile to answer a question, you can create additional tiles using the [A] button in your vertical toolbar.

Once tiles are in your workspace, they will become editable and you can replace the sample text with your own ideas.

What do you think about the Non-Residential School Formula?

{I think that...]

Defend your solution for how much water a tank needs for 30 of your fish.

{The tank will need .... because.... In my model, I...}

What total size tank, in gallons, should the donor buy, and why? You will need to complete your model and drawing before you can answer this question.

{The tank size should be ____ gallons because...}

Explain to the donor how to use your model to determine an appropriate size for any of the tanks in the aquarium.

  • What assumptions does the model use?
  • How does the drawing clarify what you have done?
  • What changes will the donor need to make?

Dear donor,

{...}

Sincerely,

Me
